DataSource.RecordSource:
Declare @FromDate datetime, @ToDate datetime
SET @FromDate = '2006-05-01' SET @ToDate = '2006-07-30'
Declare @CurrencyID int Declare @ExchangeRate float
SET @CurrencyID = 24 SELECT * FROM ( SELECT DISTINCT PO_PurchaseOrderReceiptMaster.PurchaseOrderReceiptID, PO_PurchaseOrderReceiptMaster.PostDate, PO_PurchaseOrderReceiptMaster.ReceiveNo,
PO_PurchaseOrderMaster.Code as PONo, POCurrency.Code as CurrencyCode, POParty.Code as PartyCode, POParty.Name as PartyName,
Case When POParty.CountryID = MST_CCN.CountryID then 'Local' Else 'Foreign' End as PartyType,
ITM_Product.ProductID, ITM_Product.Code AS PartNo, ITM_Product.Description as PartName, ITM_Product.Revision as PartModel, MST_UnitOfMeasure.Code as BuyingUM, ITM_Category.Code as CategoryCode, PO_PurchaseOrderReceiptDetail.ReceiveQuantity,
PO_PurchaseOrderDetail.UnitPrice * PO_PurchaseOrderReceiptDetail.ReceiveQuantity * ((SELECT ISNULL((SELECT TOP 1 ISNULL(Rate, 1) FROM MST_ExchangeRate rate WHERE rate.Approved = 1 AND rate.CurrencyID = @CurrencyID ORDER BY BeginDate DESC), 1) ) / (SELECT ISNULL( (SELECT TOP 1 ISNULL(Rate, 1) FROM MST_ExchangeRate rate WHERE rate.Approved = 1 AND rate.CurrencyID = POCurrency.CurrencyID ORDER BY BeginDate DESC), 1) )) as Amount,
0.01 * ISNULL(PO_PurchaseOrderDetail.VAT, 0) * PO_PurchaseOrderDetail.UnitPrice * PO_PurchaseOrderReceiptDetail.ReceiveQuantity * ((SELECT ISNULL( (SELECT TOP 1 ISNULL(Rate, 1) FROM MST_ExchangeRate rate WHERE rate.Approved = 1 AND rate.CurrencyID = @CurrencyID ORDER BY BeginDate DESC), 1) ) / (SELECT ISNULL( (SELECT TOP 1 ISNULL(Rate, 1) FROM MST_ExchangeRate rate WHERE rate.Approved = 1 AND rate.CurrencyID = POCurrency.CurrencyID ORDER BY BeginDate DESC), 1) )) as VATAmount,
ISNULL((SELECT SUM(Quantity) FROM PO_ReturnToVendorDetail re_Detail INNER JOIN PO_ReturnToVendorMaster re_Master ON re_Detail.ReturnToVendorMasterID = re_Master.ReturnToVendorMasterID WHERE re_Detail.ProductID = ITM_Product.ProductID AND re_Master.PostDate BETWEEN @FromDate AND @ToDate AND re_Master.PartyID = PO_PurchaseOrderMaster.PartyID ), 0) as ReturnedQuantity,
ISNULL((SELECT SUM(Amount) FROM cst_FreightDetail fre_Detail INNER JOIN cst_FreightMaster fre_Master ON fre_Detail.FreightMasterID = fre_Master.FreightMasterID WHERE fre_Detail.ProductID = ITM_Product.ProductID AND fre_Master.PostDate BETWEEN @FromDate AND @ToDate AND fre_Master.VendorID = PO_PurchaseOrderMaster.PartyID AND fre_Master.ACPurposeID = 4 AND fre_Master.ACObjectID = 1 ), 0) as ReturnedAmount,
ISNULL((SELECT SUM(VATAmount) FROM cst_FreightDetail fre_Detail INNER JOIN cst_FreightMaster fre_Master ON fre_Detail.FreightMasterID = fre_Master.FreightMasterID WHERE fre_Detail.ProductID = ITM_Product.ProductID AND fre_Master.PostDate BETWEEN @FromDate AND @ToDate AND fre_Master.VendorID = PO_PurchaseOrderMaster.PartyID AND fre_Master.ACPurposeID = 4 AND fre_Master.ACObjectID = 1 ), 0) as ReturnedVATAmount
FROM PO_PurchaseOrderReceiptMaster INNER JOIN PO_PurchaseOrderReceiptDetail ON PO_PurchaseOrderReceiptMaster.PurchaseOrderReceiptID = PO_PurchaseOrderReceiptDetail.PurchaseOrderReceiptID INNER JOIN PO_PurchaseOrderMaster ON PO_PurchaseOrderReceiptDetail.PurchaseOrderMasterID = PO_PurchaseOrderMaster.PurchaseOrderMasterID INNER JOIN PO_PurchaseOrderDetail ON PO_PurchaseOrderReceiptDetail.PurchaseOrderDetailID = PO_PurchaseOrderDetail.PurchaseOrderDetailID INNER JOIN ITM_Product ON ITM_Product.ProductID = PO_PurchaseOrderReceiptDetail.ProductID
LEFT JOIN MST_UnitOfMeasure ON PO_PurchaseOrderDetail.BuyingUMID = MST_UnitOfMeasure.UnitOfMeasureID LEFT JOIN ITM_Category ON ITM_Category.CategoryID = ITM_Product.CategoryID LEFT JOIN MST_CCN ON MST_CCN.CCNID = PO_PurchaseOrderReceiptMaster.CCNID LEFT JOIN MST_Party POParty ON POParty.PartyID = PO_PurchaseOrderMaster.PartyID LEFT JOIN MST_Currency POCurrency ON POCurrency.CurrencyID = PO_PurchaseOrderMaster.CurrencyID ) a
WHERE a.PartyType = 'Local'
